statements: SELECT * FROM clickbait_articles WHERE clickbait_flag = TRUE;
SELECT article_title FROM clickbait_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM clickbait_articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%clickbait%';
SELECT * FROM clickbait_articles WHERE article_id > 5;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM clickbait_articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, clickbait_flag FROM clickbait_articles;
SELECT article_title, clickbait_flag, article_id FROM clickbait_articles WHERE clickbait_flag = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM clickbait_articles WHERE article_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT article_title FROM clickbait_articles WHERE clickbait_flag = FALSE ORDER BY article_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM clickbait_articles WHERE clickbait_flag = TRUE AND article_id > 50 ORDER BY article_id ASC, article_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM Article;
SELECT title, clickbait_flag FROM Article;
SELECT article_id, title FROM Article ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, clickbait_flag FROM Article WHERE clickbait_flag = true;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM Review WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Article WHERE clickbait_flag = TRUE;
SELECT title, clickbait_flag FROM Article WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date FROM Review WHERE article_id = 1 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT article.title, COUNT(review.review_id) AS review_count FROM Article INNER JOIN Review ON Article.article_id = Review.article_id GROUP BY article.title ORDER BY review_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, is_clickbait FROM articles WHERE is_clickbait = true;
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM clickbait_keywords WHERE keyword LIKE 'shocking%';
SELECT article_id, is_reviewed FROM flagged_articles WHERE is_reviewed = false;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title FROM articles WHERE is_clickbait = true;
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT a.article_id, a.title, ck.keyword FROM articles a JOIN clickbait_keywords ck ON a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', ck.keyword, '%');
SELECT a.article_id, a.title, fa.is_reviewed FROM articles a LEFT JOIN flagged_articles fa ON a.article_id = fa.article_id WHERE fa.is_reviewed = false;
SELECT * FROM ClickbaitArticles;
SELECT article_title, is_clickbait FROM ClickbaitArticles WHERE is_clickbait = TRUE;
SELECT article_title, is_clickbait FROM ClickbaitArticles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_email FROM Reviewers;
SELECT article_id, task_status FROM ReviewTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM ClickbaitArticles WHERE is_clickbait = TRUE;
SELECT article_title, is_clickbait FROM ClickbaitArticles WHERE is_clickbait = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, reviewer_id, task_status FROM ReviewTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_email FROM Reviewers WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT article_id, article_title, flag_reason FROM ClickbaitArticles JOIN ClickbaitFlags ON ClickbaitArticles.article_id = ClickbaitFlags.article_id;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE is_clickbait = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT articles.title, users.username FROM articles JOIN reviews ON articles.article_id = reviews.article_id JOIN users ON reviews.reviewer_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles WHERE is_clickbait = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, a.title FROM users u JOIN reviews r ON u.user_id = r.reviewer_id JOIN articles a ON r.article_id = a.article_id WHERE r.is_clickbait_detected = TRUE;
SELECT a.title, COUNT(f.flag_id) AS flags_count FROM articles a LEFT JOIN flagged_articles f ON a.article_id = f.article_id GROUP BY a.title HAVING flags_count >= 2;
SELECT a.article_id, a.title, k.keyword FROM articles a JOIN article_keywords ak ON a.article_id = ak.article_id JOIN clickbait_keywords k ON ak.keyword_id = k.keyword_id;
